corequisites: Students enrolled in Performance 3 are required to enrol in additional 6.25 credit point ensemble (or elective), as assigned by Head of Area.
name: Performance 3
desc: Students will develop the knowledge, competencies and skills necessary to perform music at a professional level. Areas to be covered include advanced study of instrumental or vocal technique in order to cope with all stylistic demands, and specialisation in all related aspects of music performanc...
